summary: The University of Michigan, founded in 1817, is the oldest university in Michigan. It's a top research school with over 52,000 students and 8,000 faculty. The university offers 250 degree programs in 19 colleges. Its sports teams, the Wolverines, compete in NCAA Division I. Notable alumni include 8 heads of state, 47 U.S. senators, and many other leaders. The university is known for its high research activity and has won 188 Olympic medals.
title: University of Michigan
